##Line of symmetry

A $\greenD{\text{line of symmetry}}$ is a line where we can fold the image and have both halves match exactly.

**उदाहरण:**

When we divide the figure with Line $\greenD{A}$, the resulting two parts are mirror images of each other:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/59cdd5f05056d14bd6ad7f3cda61282be8d78db0)

Line $\greenD{A}$ is a line of symmetry.

*Want to learn more about lines of symmetry?  Check out [this video](/v/axis-of-symmetry).*

##Symmetrical figures

Shapes are $\purpleC{\text{symmetrical}}$ if they have at least one $\greenD{\text{line of symmetry}}$ on them.  

**उदाहरण:**

This shape is $\purpleC{\text{symmetrical}}$:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/04affa803f4534fde2d207b214ccee519e1bae56)

Because we can draw at least one $\greenD{\text{line of symmetry}}$ on it:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/897921b85f541a8893e3ea3ca76fc2781b674f6f)

*Want to learn more about symmetrical figures?  Check out [this video](/v/identifying-symmetrical-figures).*

gradedGroups.content:
**In the figure below, which of the following is a line of symmetry?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/a9c753681229c2f6e55f49fe4649961ad15553a1)

hint.content:
###Line $\blueD{A}$

When we divide the figure with Line $\blueD{A}$, the resulting two parts are mirror images of each other:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/e48f857e4db8d6000e7164326da53534dc8de1d6)

Line $\blueD{A}$ is a line of symmetry. 

###Line $\greenD{B}$

When we divide the figure with Line $\greenD{B}$, the resulting two parts are **not** mirror images of each other:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/85c96ee023b774da7ba9946a6eac68e7aeffb584)

Line $\greenD{B}$ is **not** a line of symmetry.

###Line $\purpleC{C}$

When we divide the figure with Line $\purpleC{C}$, the resulting two parts are **not** mirror images of each other:

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/451fdce3294137d37f24dca0fa6a92956e8c446d)

Line $\purpleC{C}$ is **not** a line of symmetry. 

केवल रेखा $\blueD{A}$ सममित अक्ष है।
